response.answer_text: Using binomial Theorem Using Pascal's triangle coefficients are 1 , 4 ,6,4,1 [(a + b) + (c + d)] ⁴ = (a + b) ⁴ + 4 (a + b) ³ (c + d) + 6 (a + b) ²(c+ d) ² + 4 (a + b)(c + d) ³ +( c+ d) ⁴ Again applying binomial theorem in (a + b) ⁴,(a + b) ³,(c + d) ³ & ( c+ d) ⁴and multiplying and collecting the terms you can have answer. But this is a long procedure and going to take lots of time. I hope this will help you.
